contract_type.explanation: The document is titled 'TWENTY-SECOND AMENDMENT TO FIRST LIEN ISDA 2002 MASTER AGREEMENT', explicitly indicating it is an ISDA Master Agreement amendment.

contract_type_version.explanation: The title and body repeatedly reference the 'ISDA 2002 Master Agreement', making the version explicit.

contract_date.explanation: The recitals state the original First Lien ISDA 2002 Master Agreement was dated as of March 17, 2016, which is the main contract date for this amendment.

amendment_date.explanation: The amendment is stated to be 'entered into as of April 21, 2022' in the opening paragraph.

amendment_number.explanation: The document is titled 'TWENTY-SECOND AMENDMENT', which corresponds to amendment number 22.

version_type.explanation: The document is an amendment, as indicated by the title and repeated references to 'Amendment'.

status.explanation: The document is labeled 'Execution Version', which strongly indicates it is executed.

party_name_1.explanation: The opening paragraph identifies 'MERRILL LYNCH COMMODITIES, INC.' as a party.

party_role_1.explanation: The opening paragraph explicitly designates MERRILL LYNCH COMMODITIES, INC. as 'Party A'.

party_name_2.explanation: The opening paragraph identifies 'U.S. OIL & REFINING CO.' as a party.

party_role_2.explanation: The opening paragraph explicitly designates U.S. OIL & REFINING CO. as 'Party B'.

document_quality.explanation: The text is clear, well-formatted, and free of typos or OCR errors.
